https://tmrev.io/movie/30374-Crack in the World 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jIzwXn0pU5wjOkzzRvO79gb2KjT.jpg Dr. Steven Sorenson plans to tap the geothermal energy of the Earth's interior by means of a thermonuclear device detonated deep within the Earth. This experiment causes a crack to form and grow within the Earth's crust, which threatens to split the earth in two if it is not stopped in time. Crack in the World
